meanings.definition: Choose again from a group of options.
meanings.sent1: She had to reselect a new book from the library.
meanings.sent2: After changing her mind, she reselected her outfit for the party.
meanings.sent3: The indecisive customer reselected the same item multiple times.
meanings.sent4: He reselected his path in life, aiming for a different destination.
meanings.sent5: The chef reselected the ingredients to create a better dish.

meanings.definition: To select again from a previous selection.
meanings.sent1: He reselected his favorite song on the playlist.
meanings.sent2: She reselected the same movie to watch with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The forgetful student reselected the wrong answer on the test.
meanings.sent4: The artist reselected the colors for her painting, seeking perfection.
meanings.sent5: The player reselected his character in the video game for a new challenge.
